title: Citation
description: Based on https://rs.gbif.org/extension/gbif/1.0/references.xml but includes ods specific terms

@id.description: The main identifier of the citation, preferably a DOI, ISBN, URI, etc referring to the reference

@type.description: The type of the digital object, in this case a ods:Citation

dcterms:identifier.description: The main identifier of the citation, preferably a DOI, ISBN, URI, etc referring to the reference

dcterms:type.description: The category that best matches the nature of a reference

examples: Field Guide to Moths of Eastern North America
Describes the treatments of a new species of the genus

dcterms:bibliographicCitation.description: A bibliographic reference for the resource
examples: Hartge, P., Genetics of reproductive lifespan. Nature Genetics 41, 637 - 638 (2009)

ods:hasAgents.description: The agent(s) who made the publication, contains an ods:Agent object
